text: State University of Feira de Santana (Universidade Estadual de Feira de Santana, short UEFS) is a public university of the Brazilian state of Bahia. Established in 1976, it is the second largest university in Bahia as well as one the most prestigious universities in this state. Category:Colleges and universities in Brazil Category:Bahia Category:1976 establishments in Brazil
title: State University of Feira de Santana
